name: Tempe Central - Open Water
notes: Shallow open water area, heavy KJA concentration

name: Walannae River Inlet (North)
notes: Major sediment source from upstream deforestation

name: Traditional Fishing Zone (East)
notes: Area used by traditional Bugis fishers, declining fish catch

name: Southern Shallow Zone
notes: Converted to rice paddies during dry season, seasonal lake

name: Water Hyacinth Infestation Area
notes: 30% surface coverage by water hyacinth, extreme nutrient loading

name: KJA Cluster Zone
notes: High density floating cages, uneaten feed accumulation
